original_text: The messages that these teachers speak seem very important. But their words really mean nothing. In that way, they lead people away from God. Some people have not been believers for very long. They have only just become free from the wrong things that people do. But the false teachers tell these people to do bad things that will make them happy.
korean_text: 그들이 허탄한 자랑의 말을 토하며 그릇되게 행하는 사람들에게서 겨우 피한 자들을 음란으로써 육체의 정욕 중에서 유혹하는도다

sentences.original_text: The messages that these teachers speak
But their words really mean nothing
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들의 말은 정말 아무 의미가 없습니다

sentences.original_text: In that way, they lead people away from God
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇게 그들은 사람들을 하나님에게서 멀어지게 합니다

sentences.original_text: Some people have not been believers for very long
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람들은 오랫동안 신자가 되지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: They have only just become free
from the wrong things that people do
But the false teachers tell these people
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 거짓 교사들은 이 사람들에게 말합니다
